DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Clinical Impact Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy Simulator
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To compare two different approach learn laparoscopic radical prostatectomy , without use online video simulator Design : Prospective randomize multicentric study Methods : 20 surgeon consider naive concern experience laparoscopic radical prostatectomy randomize two group :1 group use online video simulator , 1 group use usual learning method except online video simulator . All procedure record begin till end.A video review preform concern videos order identify total operative time time perform one operative step procedure.Clinical , biological histological data collect order compare two arm .
DOC.criteria: Surgeon begin clinical experience laparoscopic radical prostatectomy perform less 30 procedure enrol study Surgeon intend begin laparoscopic radical prostatectomy clinical practice Surgeons usually perform enough case enroll least 10 patient study inclusion time Surgeon access high speed internet ( > 1024 Ko/s ) Surgeons intend begin laparoscopic radical prostatectomy clinical practice
